    Megatron looked at the chaos that raged around him. He was angry. And he 
wondered how the hell could THE CODE's troops still keep fighting even after 
at the hits they recived........
    "You have cost me a great deal today! I suggest you find some way to et 
rid of those bots outside or I will rip you limb from limb! Understand?" He 
said, teeth gritted and fists clenched.

    Black Aracnia tunred to her comm, "Quickstrike, come down into the 
bunker. I need your help in exploreing. Bring Darkmouse too."
